name: DMP Electronics Inc.
description: DMP Electronics Inc. is a Taiwan-based company specializing in industrial and embedded computing solutions, offering reliable and energy-efficient embedded PCs for automation and IoT applications.

history.event: DMP Electronics Inc. was founded in Taiwan.
Launched the EBOX series of fanless embedded PCs.
